name: Jaguar Pogo Party
description:
Help King Jaguar find his birthday presents scattered throughout the ruins on his trusty pogo-stick!

This was a small game made between Feb 25 -and Mar 1 2021 for the GMC Community Jam #40

GMC Jam 40 - Forum Link
